description: Sebastian is a 26-year-old ebony beauty from Texas. He is handsome and achingly desirable. This first-timer considers today's session an extension of his fitness modeling career, maybe even a break in the movie business where he can become a star. He's somewhat nervous but this is something he can handle. None of his friends - not even his girlfriend - know about this but they'd probably get just as excited. Having abstained from sex for a few days, he's got a lot of built-up anxiety and energy so this exercise promises some good and interesting results. Sebastian starts off nice and easy, then works himself into a steady and ever-quickening rhythm, jacking himself off just like the star he is, rewarding us with a healthy explosion of chocolate flavored love.
title: Sebastian
